member.name: IWICImagingFactory2.CreateImageEncoder
member.summary: Creates a new image encoder object.
member.param: The object on which the corresponding image encoder is created.
A pointer to a variable that receives a pointer to the interface for the encoder object that you can use to encode Direct2D images.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
